class.name: AnimationNodeBlend2
class.brief_description: Blends two animations linearly inside of an [AnimationNodeBlendTree].
class.description: A resource to add to an [AnimationNodeBlendTree]. Blends two animations linearly based on the amount value. In general, the blend value should be in the [code][0.0, 1.0][/code] range. Values outside of this range can blend amplified or inverted animations, however, [AnimationNodeAdd2] works better for this purpose.
